Content.Text:
<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Good news, <MYNAME>! A new resident has
moved into town.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
I've brought him here to introduce him
to you. You can come inside now!

<FACE_KAMONBERU><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
<NAME_UNKOWN>Good morning! You're farm is something
quite special, <MYNAME>! I'm sure I will
get good, good ingredients from here!

<FACE_KAMONBERU><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
<NAME_UNKOWN>Ah, so so sorry! I got quite carried
away!
<PAGE>
My name is <BLUE>Clement</BLUE>. I've come here to
town to open a <GREEN>restaurant</GREEN>.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Clement is a famous chef.
<PAGE>
I didn't expect any success, but I sent
a letter asking if he wanted to come.
I can't believe he accepted!

<FACE_KAMONBERU><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
That's exactly how it worked out! I've
always wanted to challenge new dishes in
a brave new world!
<PAGE>
I was totally unable to find a town that
suited my extreme needs, but you've
finally provided one! Thank you!
<PAGE>
I <RED>like using things like fish</RED> in my
cooking. I hope you'll bring me some
nice presents, <MYNAME>!
<PAGE>
If I feel like it, I may even give you
one of my secret <RED>recipes</RED> in return.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
That's all we wanted to say, anyway.
Sorry for coming by so early in the
morning. Keep up the good work!

<FACE_KAMONBERU><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
If you are feeling hungry please come
by my Restaurant. Goodbye, goodbye!

A new person has come to the town! He
seems a little strange, but... let's
hope we become good friends!
